title: T205 scrapbook lot of 30 For Sale

posts.post_title: T205 scrapbook lot of 30 For Sale
posts.post_content:
I have 30 T205s for sale that were pasted in a scrapbook.All are common players. Most have the scrapbook paper still on the back but a few have paper loss. They are in varying conditions with most having strong eye appeal. Fronts range from good condition to vgex. All have little or no chipping on the borders. I'm having trouble uploading pics from my IPhone so email if interested and I can send the pics over. Price on the lot is SOLD
                                           Thanks,
                                              Steve
Bump to add Young for sale. Price is SOLD shipped. I have a few more left that I will list later today or tomorrow.
